articles.description: It will be the first time that pop star Bieber performs with Dan + Shay, showcasing their hit song 10,000 Hours. Also added Thursday are Jason Aldean and Dierks bentley.
articles.content:
With six days to go, an array of country music stars have been added as performers at the 2020 CMA Awards.
Just announced Thursday as joining the line up are Dan + Shay with Justin Bieber, Jason Ald… [+3029 chars]
